Key Arguments: The legislation is seen as an infringement on freedom of speech.
The control of information is likened to practices in authoritarian countries.
The importance of access to diverse information for forming opinions and fostering scientific discovery is emphasized.
The legislation could negatively impact critical thinking, problem-solving, and creativity.
Notable Quotes: I believe this is a huge infringement on freedom of speech.
Australia should not be added to that list.
The amendment suggests that information is one sided and it never is!
The impact this law would have on the nation is enormous.
